import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';// Auth APIs
export const signup=async(email,password)=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/auth/signup"),{email,password});return response.data;};export const login=async(email,password)=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/auth/login"),{email,password});return response.data;};// Mood Recommendation API
export const getMoodRecommendation=async answers=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/recommend"),{answers});return response.data;};// Journal APIs
export const saveJournal=async journalData=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/journal"),journalData);return response.data;};export const getJournals=async userId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/journal/").concat(userId));return response.data;};// History APIs
export const getSongHistory=async userId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/history/").concat(userId));return response.data;};export const saveSongHistory=async historyData=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/history"),historyData);return response.data;};
